message:
So, I thought that I would share a couple of my favorite recipes from bloggers in the gluten free community. Feel free to share yours. We only stand to benefit from each others trials and errors. These two recipes I've made more than once and found delicious.

Gluten Free Girl's lemon ginger bars: http://glutenfreegirl.com/gluten-free-ginger-lemon-bars/
What's Gaby Cooking molasses cookies: http://whatsgabycooking.com/gluten-free-molasses-cookies/

As well as a link to my blog post with my thoughts and modifications for them. http://livingwithoutwheat.blogspot.com/2011/02/dessert-oh-yeah.html

Please share some of your favorites, whether they are your own or a recipe you've found and fallen in love with.
